price: Whoever repents and does righteous deeds has turned to Allah with sincere repentance.
arabic: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابٗا
